short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds expand/collapse functionality to Jira backlog items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Backlog Expander is a must-have tool for anyone who uses Jira to manage their projects. This extension adds a simple yet powerful expand/collapse feature to your Jira backlog items, allowing you to streamline your workflow and improve task visibility.
